name: Modern Commando :Adventure War
description:
Modern Commando FPS Shooting Adventure 2017 is the best frontline fps game in 2017. This commando shooting game has lots of funs and fps feature. This commando shooting game has five best missions that are very interesting and full of adventure. This commando mission game has the store of weapons and grenade feature.

The ultimate sniper shooter experience is back with the latest installment to the popular commando warfare adventure, where you take on a more daunting and challenging role of leading an army to deadly missions in the enemy territory, reclaiming lost battles and engaging in spec ops warfare against mighty oppositions.

Modern Commando FPS Shooting Adventure 2017have seven types of guns that are AK47, Shoot gun, Pistol, Sniper Gun, MP5 Gun, M4. All Shooting guns have different features and shooting quality. This commando mission game the feature of grenade to kill the terrorist. AK4 have very nice shooting feature and very adventure full feature. Sniper Gun Shoot the brutal terrorist very nicely.
Modern Commando FPS Shooting Adventure 2017 has five missions that are full of adventure. The first mission is the ultimate first person shooter save the military camp. The military camp is under the terrorist attack and save the counter terrorist attack from the terrorist. It is very challenging mission and strategically mission. The second mission is hostage rescue from the terrorist attack. This is commando adventure mission. In this mission some innocent citizen captured by the some terrorist. The ultimate FPS hostage them and survive the innocent citizens.
Modern Commando FPS Shooting Adventure 2017 have the third mission that is full of adventure. This mission is frontline mission. It is very secret mission. In which mission some terrorist install a bomb in the railway station and counter terrorist attack on railway station. The Assassin sniper shoots the terrorist and diffuse the bomb form that place and that is way this mission is very thrilling mission. The commando has the modern commando features. This 3d action and thrill for you. Ops Soldier saves the life of innocent people’s life.
Modern Commando FPS Shooting Adventure 2017 has a strike mission that is why this is an fps game. In this mission some hackers hack the main server for a terrorist attack. This mission is frontline border mission. This is the war to save the precious data from hackers and killing the hackers. This is gorilla commando mission. This modern commando sniper 3d war is for saving the data from hackers. This mission accomplish when rescue the data from terrorist.
Modern Commando FPS Shooting Adventure 2017 has the last mission that is mission five. In this sucider mission some sucider attack on a police city. This mission is very impossible mission because sucider have mortal mindset. This game is full of adventure and thrilling for you.
